Actions with others tokens¶

In this section we will describe how others elements will handle DOM events.

mfrac¶

Mouse over and out¶

When the pointing device is moved onto an mfrac the element should change its background color (default to orange).

When the pointing device is moved away from an mfrac it should change its background color to original value.

This behavior can be achieve changing the color value attribute.

Click¶

When clicked it will try to perform the division.

msqrt¶

Mouse over and out¶

When the pointing device is moved onto an msqrt the element should change its background color (default to orange).

When the pointing device is moved away from an msqrt it should change its background color to original value.

This behavior can be achieve changing the color value attribute.

Click¶

When clicked it will try to perform the square root operation.

mroot¶

Mouse over and out¶

When the pointing device is moved onto an mroot the element should change its background color (default to orange).

When the pointing device is moved away from an mroot it should change its background color to original value.

This behavior can be achieve changing the color value attribute.

Click¶

When clicked it will try to perform the root operation.

msup¶

Mouse over and out¶

When the pointing device is moved onto an msup the element should change its background color (default to orange).

When the pointing device is moved away from an msup it should change its background color to original value.

This behavior can be achieve changing the color value attribute.

Click¶

When clicked it will try to perform the power operation.
